trustfund:
TF053339-PHRD-MEXICO: HIGHER EDUCATION
            FINANCING FOR INCLUSIVENESS AND COMPETITI

abstracts.cdata!:
Within the framework of the Tertiary
            Education Student Assistance Project, this Indigenous
            People's Development Plan (IPDP) identifies barriers
            for indigenous people's attainment of tertiary
            education. Further, it proposes a specific action plan to
            assist indigenous people overcome these barriers. The IPDP
            proposes an action plan to assist indigenous students,
            families and communities. The actions seek to a) assist
            indigenous students finance their studies through the
            PRONABES program (National Scholarships Program for Higher
            Education); b) assist indigenous students academically
            through peer tutoring programs, and, c) assist potential
            indigenous students and their families in choosing and
            enrolling into tertiary education through information
            campaigns. The last two actions will be carried out through
            an expansion and consolidation of the PAEIIES program
            (Support Program for Indigenous Students) administered by
            ANUIES (National Association of Universities and Higher
            Education Institutions).
